details.title: Demonstration of closed-loop airborne sense-and-avoid using machine vision
details.abstract: The ARCAA DSA program has recently demonstrated full closed-loop aircraft sense-and-avoid using vision-based sensor technology. Real-time onboard detection and tracking was accomplished by harnessing the parallel processing capabilities of GPU-based hardware. ARCAA's DSA program aims to develop a cost-effective collision avoidance capability to facilitate the routine operation of UASs in the national airspace as well as enhance manned aviation safety by complementing human pilot “see-and-avoid".
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
